translation: But even these actions should be performed, leaving aside attachment and the desire for rewards, O Arjuna; this is my certain and most assured conviction.
commentary: 18.6 Etani these? Even even? You but? Karmani actions? Sangam attachment? leaving leaving? So-and-so fruits? f and? Duties should be performed? It is thus? May My? Partha Or Arjuna? Surely certain? opinion belief? uttamam best.Commentary This is a summary of the doctrine of Karma Yoga enunciated before on several occasions.
